msg.msgText:
A "QueueManagerConnection" can be tested using the "test" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver test QueueManagerConnection help imaserver test QueueManagerConnection "Name=value" imaserver test QueueManagerConnection "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver test QueueManagerConnection "Name=QMConn1" imaserver test QueueManagerConnection "QueueManagerName=QM" "ConnectionName=127.0.0.1" "ChannelName=CHANNEL1"
Configuration items for "QueueManagerConnection" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
